title.rendered: Eldorado Stone debuts bright, rugged tones with Whitebark Cliffstone®

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone brightens the rugged textured surfaces of ledgestone veneer with the introduction of Whitebark Cliffstone®. The new color provides a brighter palette than other light color options, with tones that are reminiscent of cool climate poplar trees that are blanched by sunlight and gracefully worn by the elements. In combination with its gray and earthen tones, the lighter hues of Whitebark Cliffstone add an airy vibrancy that melds with modern design while exhibiting the authentic textural details that are characteristic of a more traditional ledgestone product.

“Like many ledgestone products, Cliffstone is incredibly popular due to its versatility in complementing modern aesthetics,” said Sarah Lograsso, Director of Marketing. “By adding Whitebark to our available color options, we’re offering designers, architects and builders a bright new palette to elevate design and spark ideas for the creative application of color and texture in a variety of spaces.”

TWEET THIS: A new color to brighten and inspire, Whitebark #Cliffstone adds a vibrant tone of ledgestone to design possibilities. @eldoradostone #stoneveneer bit.ly/ESCliffstone

The debut of Whitebark Cliffstone capitalizes on a growing trend in the use of light color tones and is the latest result of Eldorado Stone’s close interactions with key influencers from the architecture and design community. After receiving positive feedback on the bright color palettes and tones available in various Modern Collection profiles, Eldorado Stone expanded the design potential of the Cliffstone profile by adding Whitebark as its newest and brightest color option.

Distinct and refined, Cliffstone is a popular contemporary profile featuring variable sizes of stacked stone with flat-planed faces. In addition to Whitebark, Cliffstone is available in Boardwalk, Barley, Banff Springs, Montecito, Cambria, Lantana®, Mesquite® and Manzanita®.
